/* eslint-disable prettier/prettier */ import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Col, DatePicker, Form, Input, notification, Row, Select, Upload } from 'antd'; import PhoneInput, { isValidPhoneNumber } from 'react-phone-number-input' import { Option } from 'antd/lib/mentions'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import TextArea from 'antd/lib/input/TextArea'; import { Main } from '../styled'; import { PageHeader } from '../../components/page-headers/page-headers'; import { FormValidationWrap, VerticalFormStyleWrap } from '../forms/overview/Style'; import { Cards } from '../../components/cards/frame/cards-frame'; import 'react-phone-number-input/style.css' const AddSubAdmin = () => { const [form] = Form.useForm(); const [value, setValue] = useState() const getValues = (values) => { console.log(values) } const handleValidate = (value) => { const isValid = isValidPhoneNumber(value); console.log({ isValid }) return isValid } return ( <> {/* List Advertisement */} ]} />
<> handleValidate(value) }} label="End Date">
false} className="sDash_upload-basic" accept="image/*" maxCount={1} > Select File Browse
